Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.kii.sdk.photocolle.AuthenticationContext.loadFrom(Context, String)
    authenticate() loads AuthenticationContext automatically if saved. Applications should use authenticate(). If applications need to load AuthenticationContext by itself, Applications should use loadFrom(Context, String, String, String) instead of this method..
